title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 25 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 25 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

What’s the bigger threat: coronavirus or Bernie Sanders? WaPo’s Sullivan: Abandon journalism and destroy Trump. Panic over Crazy Bernie. Bloomberg doesn’t have the fire in the belly. Dems dug their own grave by changing Super Tuesday. Poor Plugs says he’s running for Senate, says he worked with long dead ChiCom leader on Paris Climate Accord. Mayor Pete getting 0% of black vote in South Carolina, heckled by black voters. Drive-Bys hope coronavirus gets Trump. New Rush Apple TV app. Trump press conference in India on coronavirus, Sotomayor. Ron Brownstein on how Obama treated Ebola, named a czar, Trump only concerned with America. CNN’s Dr. Gupta on Rush’s analysis of the coronavirus. Obama’s Ebola czar was symbolic, like hashtag response to Boko Haram.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

A lesson in liberalism: How Obama responded to Ebola and Boko Haram. Molly Ball: We hope Rush is right, but Rush may be wrong because Trump lies. Drive-Bys want coronavirus to be deadly so they can blame Trump for it. Democrats in panic over Crazy Bernie. Jonathan Chait on Bernie as an outlier. He's not an outlier, he's a mainstream Democrat. Is the coronavirus overhyped? Dr. Fauci disputes Dr. Limbaugh. Mortality rates in other countries always higher than in America.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

CDC official creates coronavirus panic, says be prepared for upending of everyday life. Thomas L. Friedman wants Democrats to form a team of rivals to beat Trump. Democrats know Trump is going to be reelected. The power of incumbency. Zeke Emanuel: Coronavirus is low-risk situation. Coronavirus is a Chinese disease, spreading because of what they eat, rampant poverty. ChiComs don't care about the death toll. Bernie doubles down on praise of Castro, ChiComs in interview with Fredo Cuomo. Fredo's past praise of Castro. Grassley: Trump is keeping America safe from coronavirus.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
